articles.title: A violent, polarized Mexico goes to the polls to choose between 2 women presidential candidates
articles.description: MEXICO CITY (AP) — Mexico goes into Sunday’s election deeply divided: friends and relatives no longer talk politics for fear of worsening unbridgeable divides, while drug cartels have split the country into a patchwork quilt of warring fiefdoms.
